description: **Update v1.4.0: Compliant with GPX 1.1 standard, ...***iCoach embeds the functionality of an advanced handheld GPS unit to Track and Graph your outdoor activities such as running, biking, hiking,... In real time you have your: Speed, Time elapsed, Distance, Avg speed, Altitude, Pace, Graphs, Heading (compass), GPS signal strength (weak to strong), Latitude, Longitude, Hor acc., Vert acc., ... iCoach allows you to save and export your track in GPX format to view and share your route in Google Earth, Google Maps or any GPX-capable application. iCoach allows you to view you current position in Google maps (satelitte view). iCoach is also ideal for geocaching. You can take a photo or a video of your current position and share it with others. You can pause and resume your track when and any times you want.
